EmailTemplate.name: IC Engage_March12_2014.Thank You Aug
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending - Resources from our Contractor Engagement webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}}, Thank you for attending our “5 Steps to Risk-Free Independent Contractor Engagement" webinar held on Wednesday, March 12. We discussed 5 actionable steps to cut misclassification risk, control contractor spend and build a program that keeps independent consultants happy and productive. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/ysvxaim0-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/March%2012_14%20IC%20Engage_PDF.pdf> IC Engage Informational Brochure <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_IC_Engage_Brochure.pdf>
